'''Song of Pearls''' is [[Sangonomiya Kokomi]]'s [[4th Ascension Passive]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* 15% of Kokomi's Healing Bonus is directly added to the percentage of Max HP from [[Nereid's Ascension]].

==Trivia==
*The Japanese version uses the term {{Lang|mini=1|ja=真珠の御唄|ja_tl=Venerable Song of Pearls}}. The kanji 御唄 can be read as ''omoro'',<ref>PDF: [https://web.flet.keio.ac.jp/~shnomura/repo2001/koryukyu.pdf 古琉球の女性祭司の活動]</ref> which refers to a divine song on the {{w|Ryukyuan religion|Ryukyuan mythology}}, the indigenous religion of {{w|Okinawa Prefecture}} and the {{w|Amami Islands}}. Most of ancient ''omoro'' are recorded in ''{{w|Omoro Sōshi|Omoro Soushi}}'', the oldest extant poetry collection written in the {{w|Northern Ryukyuan languages|Northern Ryukyuan language}}, which was compiled from 1531 to 1623.
